T.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,t.from_date as tfrom_date, s.from_date as sfrom_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no and t.from_date = s.from_date;

F.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,s.salary,e.first_name,e.last_name,e.birth_date,e.hire_date,t.from_date as tfrom_date, s.from_date as sfrom_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no join titles t on e.emp_no = t.emp_no;
